pages.title: Steel Floor Grating
pages.text: Metal gratings are popular in industries, not only due the good ratio between material consumption vs carrying capacity, but also for their peculiarity to prevent dust and other particles from piling up.$(br)Hence, items fall through the $(o)Steel Floor Grating$() shown above, while you can safely
stand on it.$(br)In case this helps your contraption: The items always fall through the centre of the grating, and are slowed down if they are too fast.
